BBEX3.M.DKK.USD.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Denmark / USD 100 = DKK ... (middle)

General: Until 1998, buying and selling rates were calculated by the commercial banks on the basis of fixed margins; 35 øre until 30 June 1994 and 55 øre from 1 July 1994 (using the middle rate in each case).
